footers.name: Simple Centered Footer
footers.description: Clean, centered footer with links and copyright

footers.name: Multi-Column Footer
footers.description: Comprehensive footer with multiple columns and detailed links
footers.template:
import Link from 'next/link' import { Mail, Phone, MapPin, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Linkedin } from 'lucide-react' interface FooterProps { companyName: string description: string columns: Array<{ title: string links: Array<{ label: string; href: string }> }> contactInfo: { email: string phone: string address: string } socialLinks: Array<{ platform: string; href: string }> copyright: string } export default function Footer({ companyName, description, columns, contactInfo, socialLinks, copyright }: FooterProps) { const getSocialIcon = (platform: string) => { switch (platform.toLowerCase()) { case 'facebook': return case 'twitter': return case 'instagram': return case 'linkedin': return default: return null } } return (

{companyName}

{description}

{socialLinks.map((social) => ( {getSocialIcon(social.platform)} ))}
{columns.map((column) => (

{column.title}

    {column.links.map((link) => (
  • {link.label}
    • ))}
))}

Contact Info

{contactInfo.email}
{contactInfo.phone}
{contactInfo.address}

{copyright}

) }

footers.name: Dark Minimal Footer
footers.description: Sleek dark footer with minimal design and gradient accents

footers.name: Professional Services Footer
footers.description: Trust-building footer for professional services with credentials and contact info
footers.template:
import Link from 'next/link' import { Mail, Phone, MapPin, Clock, Award, Shield, Linkedin, Facebook } from 'lucide-react' interface FooterProps { companyName: string tagline: string description: string navigation: Array<{ label: string; href: string }> contactInfo: { email: string phone: string address: string hours: string } credentials: Array socialLinks: Array<{ platform: string; href: string }> copyright: string } export default function Footer({ companyName, tagline, description, navigation, contactInfo, credentials, socialLinks, copyright }: FooterProps) { const getSocialIcon = (platform: string) => { switch (platform.toLowerCase()) { case 'linkedin': return case 'facebook': return default: return null } } return (
{/* Company Info */}

{companyName}

{tagline}

{description}

{/* Credentials */}

Credentials & Certifications

{credentials.map((credential, index) => ( {credential} ))}
Licensed & Insured Professional Services
{/* Quick Links */}

Quick Links

    {navigation.map((item) => (
  • {item.label}
    • ))}
{/* Contact Info */}

Contact Information

{contactInfo.address}
{contactInfo.phone}
{contactInfo.email}
{contactInfo.hours}
{socialLinks.map((social) => ( {getSocialIcon(social.platform)} ))}

{copyright}

) }

{companyName}

{tagline}

{description}

{/* Emergency Contact */}

Available 24/7 for urgent care

    • ))}

{companyName}

{tagline}

{description}

{/* Special Offers */} {specialOffers && specialOffers.length > 0 && (

{tagline}

{description}
